allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor lab2/main.py to reduce duplication and improve structure

- Replace repetitive API key checks with data-driven loop
- Rename init_client\(\) to print_api_key_status\(\) for clarity
- Add create_client\(\) and pass client via dependency injection
- Remove unused variables \(competitors, answers, messages\)
- Fix model typo: gpt-5-mini -> gpt-4o-mini

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add pyppeteer dependency for browser automation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
